text: Yarianny Arguelles (born 14 April 1984) is a Cuban athlete who specialises in the long jump. She has qualified for 2016 Summer Olympics. ELIGIBILITY CUBA until 31 DEC 2016 – eligible to represent PORTUGAL in National Representative Competitions (see Rule 5.2(a)(ii) of the IAAF Competition Rules) from 01 JAN 2020 == Personal bests == === Outdoor === {| class="wikitable" |- ! title: Yarianny Arguelles
